lyrics:
[Intro]
Dancing in the sheets
Dancing in the sheets

How come you're hiding

Dancing in the sheets
Dancing in the sheets

Grab your coat and wave goodbye to your friends

We feel the rhythm
We got the music on our side
If we go with 'em
I'll bet we'll have a wonderful ride, oh-oh

So wrap around me and, baby, let's dance
